message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a smaller share, let's negotiate further!
Compromise on a 45/55 split, still a good deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
Last chance for a decent deal, let's make it 35/65!
You're running out of time, I'm taking control!
I'll take what's left, you can have the rest. Better than nothing!
